about_the_game:
Tracery of Fate is not just a VR game; it's your personal journey into the dark yet captivating world of Alfira, teetering on the brink of annihilation. Once a grand realm, this world is now fading, but even in its twilight, it mesmerizes with apocalyptic beauty and holds countless secrets that only you can uncover.

Every step in this dying land is a challenge: ancient puzzles test your intellect, deadly traps demand agility, and sinister enemies call for courage and skill. Customize your character to suit your playstyle, enhance your combat abilities, and use strategic thinking to face the forces of evil.

Explore, solve mysteries, evade dangers, and work together with allies in an exhilarating cooperative mode. You are destined to be a beacon of hope in this dark world—the final hope for Alfira. Can you rewrite the fate of a dying world?

Features of Tracery of Fate

  • Weapon Choice and Combat Style: Arm yourself with two-handed axes, revolvers, or mix them with a protective shield to tailor your arsenal to your preferred playstyle.

  • Exploration of Captivating Locations: Discover the mysterious Bastion dungeon, the ancient and foreboding Fallow, the Dead Lower City, and the secret-laden Grotto.

  • Hunt for Relics and Blueprints: Find valuable artifacts to unlock powerful active abilities and rare consumable items.

  • Soul Crystals: Extract these from defeated enemies and use them to enhance your passive skills, creating unique combinations.

  • Character Build Flexibility: Experiment with different playstyles by adjusting your character’s skills and abilities for maximum enjoyment.

  • Life Stones: Activate these to cleanse areas of the Blight’s malevolent influence and bring light back to the world’s dark corners.

  • Cooperative or Solo Play: Progress on your own or team up with friends in groups of up to four players.

  • Puzzles and Secrets: Solve intricate challenges to access new locations, hidden areas, and valuable treasures.

Story of Tracery of Fate

Welcome to the dying world of Alfira, where every moment is a struggle for survival. After centuries of battling a demonic invasion, the goddess who once protected this world has grown weak. Now, she can no longer contain the force left by the demons—a curse known as the Blight. This ancient evil, spreading like poisonous mold, consumes all life in its path. Cities crumble into voids, and proud races—humans, elves, and orcs—perish or mutate into twisted creatures corrupted by darkness.

But that was not enough. A traitor from within—a mad necromancer—seeks to become the new god of this world. His goal is to turn the remaining survivors into an army of soulless undead and rule over the last remnants of civilization.

You are a Guardian, the last hope of this crumbling world. Created by an ancient race to fight against the demonic threat, your origins are shrouded in mystery, and your powers are nearly limitless. Armed with lethal weapons, a shield, supernatural abilities, and revolvers, you are equipped to face any challenge.

However, Alfira is unforgiving. You will face not only the necromancer's hordes of undead but also your fallen brethren—Guardians who have succumbed to his control. And as whispered rumors suggest, the banished demons are returning, their insatiable hunger driving them to consume what little remains of Alfira in their destructive march.

You must fight for this dying world, uncover its secrets, and halt the advancing darkness. Will you be the one to rewrite the fate of this world, or will Alfira become a forgotten chapter of history? The choice is yours.

Content Description

Tracery of Fate contains elements that may not be suitable for all ages or appropriate for workplace settings.

Key Content Features:

  • Frequent violence and realistic combat scenes featuring melee and ranged weapons.

  • Death effects and intense battle sequences.

  • Enemies include the undead, with depictions of their deaths and dismemberment during combat.

  • Survival themes in a grim, dying world, exposing players to harsh and tragic moments.

  • This content is designed to immerse players in a dark fantasy atmosphere, emphasizing the dramatic stakes of the story. The game is recommended for players prepared for intense emotions and scenes characteristic of the dark fantasy genre.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence, General Mature Content as: violent sword fighting and shooting; blood; skeletons, skeleton death and dismemberment scenes

name: Tracery of Fate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 10x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2070, AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Tracery of Fate is a dark fantasy cooperative/solo VR game in magic post-apocalyptic world.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
